dependencies.description:
This library simplifies using Google's various server-to-server
authentication mechanisms to access Google APIs.
dependencies.name: py-google-auth

dependencies.description: Common protobufs used in Google APIs.
dependencies.name: py-googleapis-common-protos

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
Protocol buffers are Google's language-neutral, platform-neutral,
extensible mechanism for serializing structured data - think XML, but
smaller, faster, and simpler. You define how you want your data to be
structured once, then you can use special generated source code to
easily write and read your structured data to and from a variety of data
streams and using a variety of languages.
dependencies.name: py-protobuf

dependencies.description: World timezone definitions, modern and historical.
dependencies.name: py-pytz

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
The Google API Client for Python is a client library for accessing the
Plus, Moderator, and many other Google APIs.
dependent_to.name: py-google-api-python-client

dependent_to.description: Google Cloud Appengine Logging API client library.
dependent_to.name: py-google-cloud-appengine-logging

dependent_to.description: Google Cloud Batch API client library.
dependent_to.name: py-google-cloud-batch

dependent_to.description: Google Cloud API client core library.
dependent_to.name: py-google-cloud-core

dependent_to.description: Google Cloud Storage API client library.
dependent_to.name: py-google-cloud-storage

dependent_to.description:
Horovod is a distributed deep learning training framework for
TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, and Apache MXNet.
dependent_to.name: py-horovod

dependent_to.description: A stats collection and distributed tracing framework.
dependent_to.name: py-opencensus

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system

variants.description: Enable support for gRPC Remote Procedure Call framework.
variants.name: grpc
